Have you been scammed by Record GO?

Get involved

Record Go is a car rental company that already has many alarming reviews concerning its infamous business practices. One of them are the "TOTAL CONFORT COVER", that they will mislead you to take even if you already had an insurance, but also hidden fees like the "HANDLING FEE", or the "FUEL-EMPTY" fuel policy with inflated charges.
If you think you also have been mislead and charged disproportionate amounts, take action!
